name: Handcrafted Mermaid Bracelet
description:
This beautifully handcrafted bracelet features wonderful bright blue large plastic jewels. It also features my absoloute favourite bead, the beautiful Indian Glass beads. Each bead is seperated by a turqouise shell piece, and tiny brightly coloured millefiori beads. The bracelet features the silver "made with love" heart charm, and is finished off with a purple satinette bow. As with all my products, this bracelet comes gift wrapped in a lilac organza gift bag at no extra cost, and a handmade label making it the perfect gift for someone special, or simply a wondeful treat for yourself.
Bracelet is made with Crystals Strong and stretchy elastic so should fit all wrists.
